article: Grandma Li lived alone in an old building. She was old and didn't like noise at all. The young man and woman  _  always made much noise every night, so she couldn't  go to sleep  .When the young man and woman moved out of the building, Grandma Li was very  _  . Another young man moved in and Grandma Li thought, "Well, he  looks quiet  ." But at three o'clock the next morning,  _  Grandma Li was sleeping , some  _  woke her up . She  listened  carefully. It was a dog. She thought, "There wasn't any dog here before. It must be the young  _  ." She  was angry with  him and telephoned the young man at once. Before the young man could say something, she stopped the call. Nothing more happened  _  four o'clock. Then Grandma Li's telephone rang. When she answered the phone, she heard, "I'm the man upstairs. I'm sorry to trouble you, but I want to tell you I don't have a dog at all!"
